item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter 37 lifting lightly is as important
item.description: Ten steles, first! Lingxi is located in the three mountains on the south bank, which is a complete sensation. Inside and outside the Wanyao Pavilion, at this moment, the sound was booming and spread all over the world. Many people came to the Wanyao Pavilion quickly, looking at the ten stone tablets all being the first little tortoise, they took a breath one after another. “Ten steles are the first. The little turtle has really done it!

item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter 36 little tortoise dominates!
item.description: Bai Xiaochun’s desire to build a foundation was aroused by Xu Baocai’s words. In the following days, he went to the Sutra Pavilion several times, and even to the Shenwu hall. In the Shenwu hall, there are many common sense in the Xiuzhen area, and there are also more detailed descriptions about the foundation. When I saw that what was written in it was really similar to what Xu Baocai said, Bai Xiaochun suddenly burst into flames.

item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter 35 see Xu Baocai again
item.description: [latest broadcast] tomorrow is 515, the start of the anniversary, the most welfare day. In addition to the gift bag and schoolbag, this “515 red envelope crazily flipping” must see that there is no reason why the red envelope should not be robbed~ Half a month later, Bai Xiaochun finally crushed Du Lingfei in xiaobizhong, which caused quite a stir in the clan. As a result, every time Bai Xiaochun went out, some other disciples met and said hello with a smile, which made Bai Xiaochun immediately feel that she was also a celebrity, so she liked to go out.

item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter 34 rolling of vegetation
item.description: [latest broadcast] tomorrow is 515, the start of the anniversary, the most welfare day. In addition to the gift bag and schoolbag, this “515 red envelope crazily flipping” must see that there is no reason why the red envelope should not be robbed~ Du Lingfei’s words made the outside disciples laugh. They didn’t believe that Bai Xiaochun could be better than Du Lingfei in this aspect. In particular, Bai Xiaochun’s last words, to their ears, are simply impossible, which is clearly in the same blind.

Eternal thought--Chapter 32 luck against heaven
item.description: [broadcast] students who pay attention to “starting reading” and get the first-hand news of 515 red envelopes can show their skills this time. Not only are the hearts of the people around complicated, even Du Lingfei is jealous of Bai Xiaochun’s luck. Chen Ziang and others are the same. The four of them have entered the top five, and each battle has its own consumption. If this time, the four of them have got the qualification of being in the air and have a rest, they will certainly have a great advantage in the later battles.

item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter 31 shame!
item.description: The wooden sword of the thin young man set off an extraordinary momentum and turned into a rainbow. He went straight to Bai Xiaochun. But he didn’t wait to get close to his body. Outside Bai Xiaochun’s four feet away, in the thick light of protection, the wooden sword popped back. Bai Xiaochun in the protection of the light in front of a bright, immediately relieved, dry cough a sound, simply sit cross knee.

The next morning, Bai Xiaochun walked out of the wooden house early. At a glance, he saw that the Lingdong bamboo in the holy field had grown to more than half a person’s height. He nodded with satisfaction. Then he walked out of the yard and walked along the mountain road towards the Wanyao Pavilion.

This scene makes him more eager to become a pharmacist. After lying in the yard for more than half an hour, Bai Xiaochun immediately got up and sat down on her knees.

item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter three six true words
item.description: Chapter three When Bai Xiaochun stretched out her head like this, the young man with yellow complexion and thin immediately saw her, and her eyes fell on her face, and she was furious. “You took my place!” “Not me!” It’s too late for Bai Xiaochun to shrink her head and pretend to be innocent. “Nonsense, you are so thin and your head is so small, you are definitely NEW!” Xu Baocai clenched his fist and glared at Bai Xiaochun.

item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter II fire kitchen
item.description: Chapter two. Lingxizong, located in donglinzhou, is the downstream branch of Tongtian River. Based on the north and south sides of Tongtian River, lingxizong has a history of ten thousand years and has shocked all quarters. Eight cloud shrouded Jingtian peaks lie across the Tongtian River, including four on the north bank and three on the south bank. As for the Tongtian River in the middle, there is a most majestic peak.

item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter one his name is Bai Xiaochun
item.description: Maoershan is located in the Donglin mountains. There is a village at the foot of the mountain. The people are simple and live on farming. They are isolated from the world. In the early morning, in front of the gate of the village, the villagers in the whole village were seeing off a 15-year-old boy. The young man was thin, but white, and looked very clever. Although his clothes were ordinary blue clothes, they were washed white.
